header.description: Bonjour ! I am currently a student at the University of South Brittany, in the MSc Copernicus in Digital Earth Program and next year I will start my master's thesis at the ESA Œ¶-lab on the topic of Onboard AI for Earth Observation satellites. Feel free to explore my portfolio and contact me for any inquiries or collaborations !
